TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationDeltaEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationDeltaEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationDeltaEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含資料的相關操作的位置中的變更。The class contains data about changes in the position of a manipulation. 屬性包含自上次發生的變更發生事件。The property contains the changes that occurred since the last event occurred. 屬性包含目前操作的總變更。The property contains the total changes that occurred for the current manipulation. 您可以使用其中一個屬性來轉換操作的物件。You use one of those properties to transform the manipulated object. 您可以藉由呼叫來結束操作方法或強制到慣性藉由呼叫操作方法。You can end a manipulation by calling the method or force the manipulation into inertia by calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例會使用屬性來移動、 調整大小和輪替。The example uses the property to move, resize, and rotate a . 此範例也會檢查是否慣性和矩形會觸碰視窗邊緣期間發生的事件。The example also checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果這些情況下，則為 true，應用程式會停止操作，若要防止將應用程式的可見區域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法成功，預設值先前傳送觸控與滑鼠事件，向下或滑鼠移動事件的項目和未來的操作事件不會發生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down or mouse move events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur. 觸控無法提升為滑鼠事件，如果在慣性期間發生的事件。Touch cannot be promoted to mouse events if the event occurs during inertia.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Complete() cil managed

summary.span: 完成操作但不使用慣性。

span.span: Completes the manipulation without inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫方法以結束操作。You can call the method to end the manipulation. 例如，當物件達到視窗邊緣時，您可以呼叫以防止該物件會在螢幕。For example, when an object reaches the edge of a window, you can call to prevent the object from going off the screen. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 範例會檢查是否慣性和矩形會觸碰視窗邊緣期間發生的事件。The example checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果這些情況下，則為 true，應用程式會停止操作，若要防止將應用程式的可見區域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來判斷是否在慣性期間，或當使用者擁有與接收的項目，就會發生事件事件。You can use this method to determine whether the event occurs during inertia or while the user has contact with the element that receives the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 範例會檢查是否慣性和矩形會觸碰視窗邊緣期間發生的事件。The example checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果這些情況下，則為 true，應用程式會停止操作，若要防止將應用程式的可見區域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReportBoundaryFeedback(class System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta unusedManipulation) cil managed

param.name: unusedManipulation
param.span: 代表超出界限的操作部分。

span.span: The portion of the manipulation that represents moving beyond the boundary.

summary.span: 指定操作已經超出特定界限。

span.span: Specifies that the manipulation has gone beyond certain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以表示項目已移到特定的界限之外。Use the method to indicate that an element has moved beyond a certain boundary. 例如，如果使用者將移至範圍外的項目，您可以呼叫這個方法，以回報至視窗。For example, if a user moves an element outside of the bounds of a , you can call this method to report that to the window. 當您呼叫，則就會發生事件。When you call , the event occurs. 根據預設，訂閱事件，以提供視覺化回饋給使用者，已達到界限。By default, the subscribes to the event to provide visual feedback to the user that a boundary has been reached. 您可以訂閱來實作自訂行為。You can subscribe to to implement custom behavior. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式呼叫的事件方法，當使用者將其容器的邊緣上方的項目。The following example shows an event handler for the event that calls the method when the user moves the element over the edge of its container. 若要測試此範例中，請遵循[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)並取代此程式碼中的步驟 5 中的程式碼。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 5 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ReportBoundaryFeedback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#reportboundaryfeedback)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ReportBoundaryFeedback](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#reportboundaryfeedback)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 藉由忽略後續接觸移動並引發 事件，在操作上啟動慣性。

span.span: Starts inertia on the manipulation by ignoring subsequent contact movements and raising the event.
